name: Pixel Dance Party
description:
This is my first Game Jam Game for Ludum Dare 2020.2. 

Sound by my brother Viktor Kraus (@ViktorKraus2)

Code by Me ( Felix Kraus (@Tired_Boar)

Control the Player with Arrow Keys in the loop and hit the numbers at the right timing!  

Thanks for playing

Post Jam Fixed Version: Just realised a bug, and now enabled some effects i previously had to remove.
